description:
Low-cut and cushioned, these socks are sure to inspire your next adventure. The minimalist design and mesh zones keep your feet happy while you're out on the trails.

  • Made of soft merino wool, nylon, and elastane
  • 4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place
  • Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for durability and comfort
  • Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for an irritation-free wear
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Low Ankle Socks - Unisex
